about_the_game:
You embody Hedera, a young test subject imprisoned in an inhumane experiment... Escape, free your fellow test subjects, use logic, draw on your empathy, control your emotions, and above all, use your psychic powers in this completely crazy action game!

Features


  • Colorful combat mechanics involving the control of emotions
  • Free your fellow test subjects by resolving a psychic puzzle
  • Each emotion has its unique animation and pattern
  • 2-3 hours of gameplay
  • Inspired by historical events

Protocole : Hedera is single-player combat-puzzle game. It is a PC game with gamepad controls only. The game contains 2-3 hours of gameplay with fresh new mechanics and puzzles you haven’t seen before. The game was created by the class of 2022-2023 of Campus ADN, a school of video game development in Montréal, Québec.
